Package entities

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.Player
  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Player in a game contains information about the continents and countries controlled by player, cards the player have, method to order input from user, queue to store player order and number of reinforcement armies player have.

      • getIsCommit

        public boolean getIsCommit()
        Get boolean value which depicts that player has no more orders in this turn.
        Returns:
        true if player has no more orders; else false

      • setIsCommit

        public void setIsCommit​(boolean p_isCommit)
        Used to set whenever player has no more values or when the turn has started. Set to false at start of each turn and to true when player has no more orders.
        Parameters:
        p_isCommit - true if player has no more orders; else false.

        Returns:
